metadata.title: CVE-2024-54479 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed in iPadOS17.7.3, watchOS 11.2, visionOS 2.2, tvOS 18.2, macOS Sequoia 15.2, Safari18.2, iOS 18.2 and iPadOS 18.2. Processing maliciously crafted web contentmay lead to an unexpected process crash.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in oracular is affected and needs fixing.
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
